contents: "Aug 10, 2021 - Elon Musk's ""mission to change the world"", A new book explores how Elon Musk's electric car company Tesla has changed the automotive industry. Tim Higgins, author of ""Power Play: Tesla, Elon Musk, and the Bet of a Century,"" joined CBSN to discuss how Tesla combined a vision of Silicon Valley with the ""harsh reality of Detroit."""
